EmailTemplate.name: 2019.08.02 - BS - Docking Station - FR.BS - Docking Station - FR
EmailTemplate.subject: Raccordez vos appareils à une station d’accueil
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-benefits-of-a-docking-station.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Une station d’accueil permet de connecter : Écrans multiples <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Moniteurs/_/N-8tk?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Moniteurs/_/N-8tk?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Souris sans fil <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Souris/_/N-8rz?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Souris/_/N-8rz?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Clavier et autres <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Claviers/_/N-8rs?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/FR/search/pages/browse/Claviers/_/N-8rs?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Rien de plus simple pour vous connecter rapidement à tous vos accessoires informatiques.
Découvrez tous les avantages d’une station d’accueil. En savoir plus <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-benefits-of-a-docking-station.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
